content: UFC Fight Night 213Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: .5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1 point)b)  Predict how many Total Strikes Match 10 winner will score (if it's a draw, the highest of the two Total Strikes scored will be used)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-kattar-vs-allen/matchesMatches10. Calvin Kattar vs. Arnold Allen9. Max Griffin vs. Tim Means8. Waldo Cortes-Acosta vs. Jared Vanderaa7. Josh Fremd vs. Tresean Gore6. Dustin Jacoby vs. Khalil Rountree5. Roman Dolidze vs. Phil Hawes4. Andrei Arlovski vs. Marcos Rogerio de Lima3. Joseph Holmes vs. Junyong Park2. Steve Garcia vs. Chase Hooper1. Cody Durden vs. Carlos Mota Match 10 winner Total Strikes:Example10. Calvin Kattar 9. Max Griffin 8. Waldo Cortes-Acosta 7. Josh Fremd 6. Dustin Jacoby 5. Roman Dolidze 4. Andrei Arlovski 3. Joseph Holmes 2. Steve Garcia 1. Cody Durden Match 10 winner Total Strikes: 60  (Small print)* Prizes will be prioritized based on overall general forum participation and activity *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
